fields.name: Little Alpha trivia:
fields.value:
There used to be a bug where Trickster redirecting a kill always showed up as Berserker.
Attack: Powerful | Defense: Basic

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack a player on Full Moon Nights.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- With each kill, your powers grow.
- On your first kill, you may attack each night.
- On your second kill, you will Rampage at your target's house, passively killing any visitors.
- On your third kill, you will transform into (3872) War.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill three players and become War.
